Title: Relates to conducting a study on the use of solid antimicrobial materials for touch surfaces in the construction of public buildings
Summary: Directs the commissioner of health, in consultation with the commissioner of the office of general services, to conduct a study on the use of solid antimicrobial materials for touch surfaces in the construction of public buildings.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to conducting a study on the use of solid antimicrobial materials for touch surfaces in the construction of public buildings
